sentence.Network_en: He had a vaguely disreputable appearance.

entry.tran: 名声不好的;不名誉的;不光彩的
entry.def: If you say that someone or something is disreputable, you are critical of them because they are not respectable or cannot be trusted.

example.ex: He was found to have been enjoying the company of disreputable women.
example.tran: 他被人发现喜欢与那些不三不四的女人混在一起。
最为喧哗、名声最差的酒吧

means.word_mean: 1. lacking respectability in character or behavior or appearance
